resources.string: Write words in box and click on add button to add in the list below
Add as many words as you can until timer runs out (Check for the timer on top left corner)
You can also check on how many words you have added on top right corner
Once you have managed to add required number of words the timer will stop automatically on last word added and you can then see you score
You can leave the game and your stats will not be saved (Game Over)
Your timer will start when you click the "Test My Mind" button below make sure to relax and do your best
